game.name: GOD FORSAKEN
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 《신이 버린 땅》은 《디아블로》의 특색을 결합한 로그라이트 생존 모험 게임입니다. 이 버려진 절망의 땅에서 당신은 끝없는 몬스터들을 물리치고, 어둠 속에 불을 켜, 희미한 희망 빛을 찾습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The God - Forsaken Land is a roguelike survival adventure game that combines the features of Diablo. In this abandoned land of despair, you fend off endless monsters, light a fire in the darkness, and search for that faint glimmer of hope.

reviewHighlights.text: game needs a major overhaul , sound issues , zero ambient music in the background to enjoy , 3 levels are currently open , 1 skill spinning blades is...
This is honestly one of the worst games you could spend money on.. its not worth the price as it is now.. It is never ending bugs and things thrown to...
